game.title: Eon's Edge
game.synopsis: In a world where ancient magic has awakened, players take on the role of an Eonian Guardian tasked with protecting the realm from destruction. The forces of darkness have returned, seeking to exploit the power vacuum left by the downfall of the previous world order.
game.beginning: As the last hope for the realm, you embark on a perilous journey across sprawling landscapes and mysterious realms, uncovering ancient secrets and mastering forgotten abilities. Your quest begins in the ruins of an ancient city, where cryptic artifacts hold the key to unlocking your Eonian powers.
game.ending: With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, you face off against the dark forces' powerful leader in a climactic battle at the Edge of Eternity. Victory will restore balance to the realm and usher in a new era; defeat will plunge the world into eternal darkness, erasing all memory of your existence.
